languages.text: {n}Но даже в этих ужасах он, кажется, умудряется отыскать нечто, придающее ему сил. На искаженном судорогой лице возникает мерзкая победительная ухмылка.{/n}
{n}And yet even in this pit of horrors, he somehow manages to latch onto something that gives him strength. A nasty, triumphant smirk spreads across his spasm-ridden face.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Но даже в этих ужасах он, кажется, умудряется отыскать нечто, придающее ему сил. На искаженном судорогой лице возникает мерзкая победительная ухмылка.{/n}

{n}And yet even in this pit of horrors, he somehow manages to latch onto something that gives him strength. A nasty, triumphant smirk spreads across his spasm-ridden face.{/n}

languages.text: {n}E incluso en esta fosa de pesadilla, consigue de alguna forma aferrarse a algo que le da fuerzas. Una sonrisa triunfal y desagradable se extiende por su rostro a pesar de los espasmos que sufre.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}And yet even in this pit of horrors, he somehow manages to latch onto something that gives him strength. A nasty, triumphant smirk spreads across his spasm-ridden face.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}E incluso en esta fosa de pesadilla, consigue de alguna forma aferrarse a algo que le da fuerzas. Una sonrisa triunfal y desagradable se extiende por su rostro a pesar de los espasmos que sufre.{/n}

languages.text: {n}しかし、この恐怖のどん底にあっても、男はどうにかして力を与えてくれるものにしがみつく。顔中はピクピクして、その顔に意地の悪い、勝ち誇ったような笑みが広がる。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}And yet even in this pit of horrors, he somehow manages to latch onto something that gives him strength. A nasty, triumphant smirk spreads across his spasm-ridden face.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}しかし、この恐怖のどん底にあっても、男はどうにかして力を与えてくれるものにしがみつく。顔中はピクピクして、その顔に意地の悪い、勝ち誇ったような笑みが広がる。{/n}

languages.text: {n}但即便是在这样的恐怖之中，他还是想办法找到了能赐予他力量的东西。他痉挛的脸上露出了令人厌恶的得意笑容，充满了胜利的意味。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}And yet even in this pit of horrors, he somehow manages to latch onto something that gives him strength. A nasty, triumphant smirk spreads across his spasm-ridden face.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}但即便是在这样的恐怖之中，他还是想办法找到了能赐予他力量的东西。他痉挛的脸上露出了令人厌恶的得意笑容，充满了胜利的意味。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Und doch gelingt es ihm selbst in dieser Hölle der Qualen, sich an etwas festzuklammern, was ihm Stärke schenkt. Ein widerwärtiges, triumphales Grinsen macht sich auf seinem zuckenden Gesicht breit.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}And yet even in this pit of horrors, he somehow manages to latch onto something that gives him strength. A nasty, triumphant smirk spreads across his spasm-ridden face.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Und doch gelingt es ihm selbst in dieser Hölle der Qualen, sich an etwas festzuklammern, was ihm Stärke schenkt. Ein widerwärtiges, triumphales Grinsen macht sich auf seinem zuckenden Gesicht breit.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Contre toute attente, il parvient à trouver en lui la force de ne pas succomber à cet abîme d'horreurs sans nom. Un rictus aussi malveillant que triomphant s'épanouit sur ses traits agités de spasmes nerveux.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}And yet even in this pit of horrors, he somehow manages to latch onto something that gives him strength. A nasty, triumphant smirk spreads across his spasm-ridden face.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Contre toute attente, il parvient à trouver en lui la force de ne pas succomber à cet abîme d'horreurs sans nom. Un rictus aussi malveillant que triomphant s'épanouit sur ses traits agités de spasmes nerveux.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Dehşetlerle ağzına kadar dolmuş bu çukurda, yine de kendisine kuvvet veren bir şeye tutunmayı bir şekilde başarıyor. Spazmın hâkim olduğu yüzüne zafer dolu pis bir sırıtış yayılıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}And yet even in this pit of horrors, he somehow manages to latch onto something that gives him strength. A nasty, triumphant smirk spreads across his spasm-ridden face.{/n}
